title: 7 Billion Needles, Vol. 4
description: WE ARE NOT ALONEShould life on earth just start over from its primordial methanogen form? For a high school girl, that all depends on whether she can connect to her classmates. But what does oneness mean? This concluding volume also includes the short comic “Hikikomori Headphone Girl,” the series’ precursor.
author: Nobuaki Tadano
